```{r}
features = read.csv("features.csv",header = T)
train = read.csv("train.csv",header = T)
test = read.csv("test.csv",header = T)
stores = read.csv("stores.csv",header = T)

```
```{r}
dataset = merge(train,stores, by="Store")
```

```{r}
#dataset = merge(dataset,features, by="Store")

```
```{r}
library(lubridate)
dataset$year <- year(ymd(dataset$Date))
dataset$month <- month(ymd(dataset$Date)) 
dataset$day <- day(ymd(dataset$Date))
```
```{r}
library("plyr")
month_wise =ddply(dataset, .(month), summarize,  Sales=mean(Weekly_Sales))
barplot(month_wise$Sales, main="Monthly Sales", xlab="Month", ylab="Sales")
```

```{r}
store_wise =ddply(dataset, .(Store), summarize,  Sales=mean(Weekly_Sales))

barplot(store_wise$Sales, main="Store Sales", xlab="Stores", ylab="Sales")
```
```{r}
dept_wise =ddply(dataset, .(Dept), summarize,  Sales=mean(Weekly_Sales))
barplot(dept_wise$Sales, main="Sales by Department", xlab="Departments", ylab="Sales", names.arg = dept_wise$Dept )
```
